001package edu.pdx.cs410J.whitlock;
002
003import java.io.PrintWriter;
004import java.io.Writer;
005
006public class TextDumper {
007  private final Writer writer;
008
009  public TextDumper(Writer writer) {
010    this.writer = writer;
011  }
012
013  public void dump(Airline airline) {
014    try (
015      PrintWriter pw = new PrintWriter(this.writer)
016    ) {
017      pw.println(airline.getName());
018
019      airline.getFlights().forEach(flight -> {
020          pw.println(flight.getNumber());
021        }
022      );
023
024      pw.flush();
025    }
026  }
027}
